success.title: School Year Deleted
success.message: The school year {schoolYear}, along with all its classes, students, and their photos, has been successfully deleted.

error.title: School Year Deletion Failed
error.message: Failed to delete the school year {schoolYear}, along with all its classes, students, and their photos. Please try again.

modal.title: Delete School Year Confirmation
modal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this school year? Deleting this school year will also delete all associated classes, students, and their photos. This action cannot be undone. Please confirm your decision.

zipDownloadFailed.title: Zip Download Failed
zipDownloadFailed.message: The zip file could not be downloaded. Please try again.

deleteSuccess.title: Class Deleted
deleteSuccess.message: The class {clazz} for the school year {schoolYear} and its photos have been successfully deleted.

deleteError.title: Class Deletion Failed
deleteError.message: Failed to delete the class {clazz} for the school year {schoolYear}. Please try again.

modal.title: Delete Class Confirmation
modal.text: Are you sure you want to delete this class? Deleting this class will also delete all associated students and their photos. This action cannot be undone. Please confirm your decision.

NotFoundPage.title: Nothing to see here
NotFoundPage.text: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL. If you think this is an error contact support.
NotFoundPage.buttonText: Take me back to home page

label.dragAndDrop: Drag'n'drop files here to upload. We can accept only

first.title: Automated Photo Processing
first.description: Automatically crops and names photographs of new students, saving teachers from having to do this manually.

second.title: Standardized Profile Pictures
second.description: Applies a standard set of edits to each photo, ensuring that all profile pictures have a consistent appearance.

third.title: User-Friendly Interface
third.description: Provides a simple, intuitive interface that makes it easy for teachers to upload photos, view the processed results, and make any necessary adjustments.

MainBanner.description: Simplify the process of cropping, naming, and editing new student photos with our web-based application. Designed to increase efficiency, unify the look of profile photos, and ease administrative procedures.

schoolYear.errorMessage: School year must be filled in and cannot be in the future.

clazzName.errorMessage: Class name must be filled in.

valid.title: Confirm Upload
valid.text: All data has been validated and is ready for upload. Are you sure you want to proceed?

error.title: Data Validation Error
error.text: The data is not valid. This could be due to the number of names not matching the number of photos, or because no face was found in some photos. Please check your data and try again.

notification.title: Photo Download Failed
notification.message: The photo could not be downloaded. Please try again.
